metadata.Name: TriviaQA
metadata.Description: A large scale distantly supervised challenge dataset for reading comprehension
metadata.Paper Title: TriviaQA: A Large Scale Distantly Supervised Challenge Dataset for Reading Comprehension
metadata.Venue Title: Proceedings of the 2017 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
Affiliations: Paul G. Allen School of Computer Science & Engineering, Univ. of Washington, Seattle, WA
Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence, Seattle, WA
metadata.Abstract: We present TriviaQA, a challenging reading comprehension dataset containing over 650K question-answer-evidence triples. TriviaQA includes 95K question-answer pairs authored by trivia enthusiasts and independently gathered evidence documents, six per question on average, that provide high quality distant supervision for answering the questions.
